synopsis.text: Sakiâ€™s past as a delinquent has landed her in a reform school, but now she's been offered an opportunity to turn her life around. Tasked with infiltrating her old high school as an undercover agent, Saki must investigate a series of mysterious deaths and confront the powerful Mizuchi sisters who have taken control in her absence. Armed with a unique yo-yo weapon and the determination to save her mother from a potential death sentence, Saki is ready to take on this dangerous mission. With her life on the line, she'll need to rely on her street smarts and combat skills to uncover the truth and bring the criminals to justice. Will she succeed in her mission and clear her name, or will she become the next victim?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
